vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in MockOracle.sol:
	- Version used: ['0.6.12', 'ABIEncoderV2']
	- MockOracle.sol#5 declares pragma solidity0.6.12
	- MockOracle.sol#6 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in MockOracle.sol:
	- pragma solidity0.6.12 (MockOracle.sol#5): it allows old versions

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))
